label: ID
desc: incident identifier.

label: Process Transition
desc: eight levels controlling the incident management process transitions from opening until closing the case.

label: Status
desc: boolean attribute that shows whether the record is active or closed/canceled.

label: Group Chg Count
desc: number of times the incident has the group or the support analysts changed.

label: Rejection Count
desc: number of times the incident resolution was rejected by the caller.

label: Update Count
desc: number of incident updates until that moment.

label: SLA Exceeded
desc: boolean attribute that shows whether the incident exceeded the target SLA.

label: Affected User
desc: identifier of the user affected.

label: Reported By
desc: identifier of the user who reported the incident.

label: Opened Date
desc: incident user opening date and time

label: Opened By
desc: identifier of the user who registered the incident.

label: Created Date
desc: incident system creation date and time.

label: Updated By
desc: identifier of the user who updated the incident and generated the current log record.

label: Update Date
desc: incident system update date and time.

label: Reported Via
desc: categorical attribute that shows by what means the incident was reported.

label: Location ID
desc: identifier of the location of the place affected.

label: Service Category
desc: first-level description of the affected service.

label: Service Subcategory
desc: second-level description of the affected service (related to the first level description, i.e., to category).

label: Service Availability
desc: description of the user perception about service availability.

label: Affected Item
desc: (confirmation item) identifier used to report the affected item (not mandatory).

label: Impact Description
desc: description of the impact caused by the incident.

label: Urgency Level
desc: description of the urgency informed by the user for the incident resolution.

label: Priority
desc: calculated by the system based on 'impact' and 'urgency'.

label: Support Group
desc: identifier of the support group in charge of the incident.

label: Assigned To
desc: identifier of the user in charge of the incident.

label: KB Used
desc: boolean attribute that shows whether a knowledge base document was used to resolve the incident.

label: Priority Verified
desc: boolean attribute that shows whether the priority field has been double-checked.

label: Notifications
desc: categorical attribute that shows whether notifications were generated for the incident.

label: Problem ID
desc: identifier of the problem associated with the incident.

label: Change Request
desc: (request for change) identifier of the change request associated with the incident.

label: Vendor ID
desc: identifier of the vendor in charge of the incident.

label: RFC Responsible
desc: identifier of the RFC responsible by the incident.

label: Resolution ID
desc: identifier of the resolution of the incident.

label: Resolved By
desc: identifier of the user who resolved the incident.

label: Resolved Date
desc: incident user resolution date and time (dependent variable).

label: Closed Date
desc: incident user close date and time (dependent variable).
